thread.title: Snapped! Akshay Kumar with daughter Nitara
thread.title_full: Snapped! Akshay Kumar with daughter Nitara - Entertainment

author: A Correspondent
title: Snapped! Akshay Kumar with daughter Nitara
text:
Bollywood superstar Akshay Kumar has taken off with his family for a holiday. The Khiladi's wife, Twinkle Khanna, took to Twitter to share an adorable picture of their daughter Nitara with her doting dad.
And we are off #HolidayHoliday pic.twitter.com/YJf27ZShmz 
— Twinkle Khanna (@mrsfunnybones) October 21, 2015 Nitara can be seen sitting on her daddy dearest's lap and the father-daughter duo are gazing out of the window of their plane.
Last seen in 'Singh Is Bliing', Akshay Kumar is gearing up for the release of his next 'Housefull 3'. Akshay was accompanied by wife Twinkle in London while shooting for the film.
Been shooting in England for #Housefull3 . Made d most of my day off roaming around Norwich with the wife! #funtimes pic.twitter.com/PlTTAcJAuE 
— Akshay Kumar (@akshaykumar) October 13, 2015 Directed by Sajid-Farhad, the movie is the third instalment of the comedy franchise 'Housefull'. The film also stars Abhishek Bachchan, Riteish Deshmukh, Jacqueline Fernandez, Nargis Fakhri and Lisa Haydon.
Also see: First look of 'Housefull 3' revealed 
In June, Akshay and Twinkle had taken off to France to enjoy some time off from their hectic schedules. (View pics) 
Also see:  This photo proves why Akshay Kumar is the 'Khatron Ka Khiladi'
